channel.title: Students List on Chao ZHOU
channel.description: Recent content in Students List on Chao ZHOU

item.title: Mengge LI
item.description: Bio I am a PhD candidate at the National University of Singapore, under the supervision of Dr. Chao ZHOU. My Info Email: li.mengge@u.nus.edu CV

item.title: Junbeom Lee
item.description: Bio Currently, I am a Quant Trader at Yuanta Securities(Seoul, South Korea) I was a research fellow working with the Department of Mathematics in the National University of Singapore. I received my Ph.D. in 2018 on my thesis about XVA. Before I started my Ph.D. program, I had worked for a finance company as a quant for 2 years. My Info Email: junbeoml22@gmail.com Github LinkedIn CV

item.title: Meixia LIN
item.description: Bio Ph.D student in Department of Mathematics, under the supervision of Kim-Chuan TOH and Chao ZHOU. My Info Email: lin_meixia@u.nus.edu CV

item.title: Tan Hong Ming
item.description: Bio I am a PhD candidate at the Institute of Operations Research and Analytics, IORA, NUS. My research interest is decision making under uncertainty, bayesian learning, pricing revenue management, and sport analytics. I am interested to learn about the optimal actions people or companies should take when faced with uncertainty about the consequences of events. I mainly use analytical models to approach my research questions. My Info Email: thm@u.

item.title: Xizhi Su
item.description: Bio I am a PhD student at the National University of Singapore. My advisors are Dr. Chao Zhou and Prof Min Dai. My current research projects are portfolio optimization under information frictions and singular controls applied in finance. I am also interested in applications of deep neural networks. Before coming to Singapore, I have completed a Master’s degree from Part III at Cambridge University. My essay advisor was Professor Frank P.
